original_text:
Unless the Lord Almighty
    had left us some survivors,
we would have become like Sodom,
    we would have been like Gomorrah.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 우리를 위하여 생존자를 조금 남겨 두지 아니하셨더면 우리가 소돔 같고 고모라 같았으리로다

sentences.original_text: Unless the Lord Almighty had left us some survivors
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 전능하신 주께서 우리에게 생존자를 남겨두지 않으셨다면

sentences.original_text: we would have become like Sodom
we would have been like Gomorrah
